nodes.text: The Keshiri religion was commonly followed on the planet Kesh, and revolved around tales of the Skyborn and the Otherside, who were believed to have battled in the stars. The Skyborn won the so-called Great Battle but were wounded, and their blood formed the Kesh's landmass. After the arrival of the Sith in 5000 BBY, the Skyborn myths were changed, instead featuring the Protectors and the Destructors.
